description:
After the last human war, gases were spread through the atmosphere, making it unbreathable. 
The richest fled to orbital colonies and the others took refuge underground.

You are a young hothead, hired by a team of scientists left on earth who are looking for a solution to bring humans back to the surface.

Playable from 1 to 4 players (local co-op), 
Hexapoda is inspired by Arcade classics.

 - 3 Game Modes : Normal , Hard and Manic.
 - Unlock 3 Different endings, new features and new items.
 - 12 stages
 - 4 futuristic combat aircrafts with their own style of shooting
 - A bestiary composed of giant insects
 - Unlock all the 30 "in-game" achievements
 - Local leaderboards for each game mode.

Powered by an original epic soundtrack composed by the French band of electronic music: Double Dragon.
name: HEXAPODA
